item.title: Bezipped_0.9.5
item.description:
Bezipped Release Notes

What's New

  • Added a preference for Growl.
  • The preferences window now closes by invoking Command+W on the keyboard.
  • New application icon.

Known Issues

  • A proper "About" box needs to be created thanking everyone who helped me with my first ever app release.

item.title: Bezipped_0.9
item.description:
Bezipped Release Notes

What's New

  • Only one copy of the preferences window shows up when the "Preferences..." menu item is chosen.
  • The scroll bar does not display when there is only one item in the list.
  • The "reveal in Finder" button will now follow the file around the file system if the user moves the archive after it has been created.

Known Issues

  • If the destination of the archive being built is "/" the archive disappears.
  • The preferences window cannot be closed by invoking Command+W on the keyboard.
